post:
bodHOST.com – we provide fully managed Linux and Windows VPS servers along with cPanel/WHM and Plesk control panel. Our VPS servers are based on cloud computing architecture that ensures high uptime and redundancy. We use vLite platform for Linux and Hyper-V for Windows virtual machines. Along with adequate resources and affordable price you will find our customer support always online 24/7, including billing department as well. Hence, you can contact us anytime.

  • RAM: 1.5 GB
  • IPs: 2 Dedicated IPs
  • Price: $29.99/month

VPS Enterprise

  • IPs: 2 Dedicated IPs

VPS Corporate

  • Price: $69.99/month
